definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: chu1 xue4 xing4 deng1 ge2 re4

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic method and bleeding mechanism of the hemorrhagic moyamoya disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出血性烟雾病的出血机制及检查诊断方法。

sentences.english: This paper summarized professor Wang Zuo's experience in the treatment of acute hemorrhagic apoplexy.
sentences.chinese: 总结王左教授对急性出血性中风的认识。

sentences.english: Objective To appraise the clinic effect of mini-invasive drainage on hemorrhages cerebral apoplexy with herniation.
sentences.chinese: 探讨微创穿刺引流对出血性脑卒中并脑疝的治疗价值。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the etiological factor and diagnostic method of Moyamoya disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究出血性烟雾病的出血机制及检查诊断方法。

sentences.english: Metastases may lead to a hemorrhagic pericarditis.
sentences.chinese: 转移性肿瘤可导致出血性心包炎。

sentences.english: Objictive Treatment of 15 patients with intracranial hemorrhagic cerebral vascular diseases with stent grafts.
sentences.chinese: 目的初步应用带膜支架治疗出血性脑血管病15例。

sentences.english: Thrombocytopenia is one of the most common bleeding disorders of animals.
sentences.chinese: 血小板减少症是动物最常见的出血性疾病之一。

sentences.english: Bleeding esophageal varices may be the first manifestation of cirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 出血性食管静脉曲张可能是肝硬化的首要表现。

sentences.english: Most fatalities occur in patients who develop the haemorrhagic icterus form.
sentences.chinese: 大多数死亡是有出血性黄疸症状的患者。

sentences.english: It has two distinct presentations, acute hemorrhagic enteritis and non-suppurative myocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 以急性出血性肠炎和非化脓性心肌炎为特征。

sentences.english: It occurs when twisting of the spermatic cord cuts off the venous drainage, leading to hemorrhagic infarction.
sentences.chinese: 精索扭转阻断静脉回流就会导致出血性梗死。

sentences.english: But it did not measurably raise the risk of the other major type, hemorrhagic stroke, in which a blood vessel leaks or bursts open.
sentences.chinese: 但沮丧不会导致出血性中风即血管泄露或血管爆裂。

sentences.english: Here is a cerebral infarct from an arterial embolus, which often leads to a hemorrhagic appearance.
sentences.chinese: 动脉栓子引起的脑梗死，常导致出血性外观。

sentences.english: But it can result in bleeding, which hold back its use in anti-inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 但因其潜在的出血性限制了它在抗炎方面的应用。

sentences.english: The incidence of hemorrhagic lacunar syndrome causes, mainly caused by high blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 出血性腔隙综合征的发病原因，主要由高血压引起。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience for microsurgery treatment of spontaneous supratentorial intracerebral haematoma .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨自发性出血性脑卒中的显微外科治疗方法。

definition: to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
